name: Pipe
overview: This Pipe Dream/Pipe Mania clone was released on Magic Disk 64 1993/09. When you have very little time, you need a game that needs even less. The loading time in particular comes into the foreground, who has always had time just to dare a short game. The game principle of "Pipe" is very simple. You build pipe pieces at a starting station (bottom right) until you have connected them to the destination station. To achieve this, you can use the joystick in port # 2 to find pieces of pipe on the right-hand side and insert them at the push of a button. The computer in turn tries to achieve the same goal, but it has to build from the bottom left to the top right. So your job is to be faster than your beloved adding machine. Two more things. The good news first: the pipes do not interfere with each other. The bad: no train can be withdrawn, Click once incorrectly and the game is lost. In the title picture you can make some pre-settings by moving the joystick. up / down - computer speed left / right - number of obstacles As soon as you have started the game with a short push of a button and the first piece of your pipeline has been laid, the computer also begins its construction.
